amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting migrants and local communities against COVID-19.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3797 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 88 - 11. Record Vote Number: 347.

action.text: Amendment SA 3797 proposed by Senator Marshall. (consideration: CR S6230; text: CR S6230) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting migrants and local communities against COVID-19.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3797 proposed by Senator Marshall.
